import React from'react';function padNumber(value){return value>9?String(value):"0"+value;}var Time=function Time(_ref){var time=_ref.time,done=_ref.done;var hours=padNumber(Math.floor(time/3600000));var minutes=padNumber(Math.floor(time/60000)%60);var seconds=padNumber(Math.floor(time/1000)%60);// Tip: 1000 ms = 1 second
var c=padNumber(Math.round(time/10)%100);return React.createElement("p",{className:done?done:'',style:{margin:0}},hours,":",minutes,":",seconds,".",React.createElement("small",null,c));};export default Time;
